alert.note: Alert for Interior Waldo; Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 3:22AM EST until February 08 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch expected. * WHERE...Kennebec and Interior Waldo Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will likely impact this evening`s and Tuesday morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of drizzle or freezing drizzle may occur before snow. Precipitation falling on cold, bare surfaces may lead to icy conditions despite air temperatures that may be above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..
